query_1.text: How did Michael Jackson's innovative music videos, such as 'Thriller' and 'Billie Jean', contribute to the evolution of the music industry and popular culture?

query_2.text: In what ways did Whitney Houston's vocal techniques and emotional delivery influence the standards of pop and R&B music during her career?

query_3.text: How did David Bowie's ability to reinvent his musical style and persona impact the landscape of rock music and popular culture in the 20th century?

query_4.text: In what ways did Freddie Mercury's theatrical performances and songwriting contribute to the enduring legacy of Queen as one of the greatest rock bands in history?

query_5.text: How has Ariana Grande's blend of pop and R&B, along with her vocal range, shaped contemporary music trends and influenced a new generation of artists?

query_6.text: In what ways did Bob Marley's music and message of peace and social justice resonate globally, and how did it contribute to the popularity of reggae music?
